name: Asynchronous Computed Point_1572551149
description:
PT Ratio = 40:1
CT Ratio = 50:5
K = CT Ratio * PT Ratio
K = 40 x 10
K = 400
Pulse Weight (Ke) or (Wh/Pulse) = 0.6
Therefore as per calculation stated below the correct KWh/Pulse will be as follows:
KWh/Pulse = (K * Ke)/1000
KWh/Pulse = (400 * 0.6)/1000
KWh/Pulse = 0.24
McLaren Bay Special Care Synergy Computed Point Equation = (yPulse * 0.24) + (zPulse * 0.24) = Electric Consumption (kWh)
